name: GetEventInvitees
description:
Fetch invitees for a specific scheduled event.

Use this tool to retrieve a list of people invited to a specific event by providing the event's unique identifier. It helps in managing and viewing event attendees.

parameters.name: event_unique_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the event to retrieve invitees for. Use this to specify which event's attendees you want to list.

parameters.name: invitee_status
parameters.description: Filter invitees by their status: 'active' or 'canceled'.

value_schema.description: Indicates if the invitee "canceled" or still "active"

parameters.name: sort_order_by_creation
parameters.description: Specify the sort order of invitees by their created_at date. Use "asc" for ascending or "desc" for descending order.

value_schema.description: Order results by the **created_at** field and direction specified: ascending ("asc") or descending ("desc")

parameters.name: filter_by_email
parameters.description: Filter results by the invitee's email address. Only invitees with this email will be returned.

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by email address

parameters.name: pagination_token
parameters.description: Token for fetching the next or previous portion of the event invitee list.

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: number_of_invitees_to_return
parameters.description: The number of invitee records to return in the response. Determines how many invitees are included per request.

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Indicates if the invitee "canceled" or still "active"

value_schema.description: Indicates if the invitee "canceled" or still "active"

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Order results by the **created_at** field and direction specified: ascending ("asc") or descending ("desc")

value_schema.description: Order results by the **created_at** field and direction specified: ascending ("asc") or descending ("desc")

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by email address

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by email address

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of rows to return

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
